# MTLCommandBufferHandler

**Type Alias**

A completion handler signature a GPU device calls when it finishes scheduling a command buffer, or when the GPU finishes running it.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias MTLCommandBufferHandler = (any MTLCommandBuffer) -> Void
```

## Parameters

- **commandBuffer**: The [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBuffer] instance thatâ€™s invoking the completion handler.

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBuffer] type uses this signature in its methods that register your completion handlers, including [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBuffer/addScheduledHandler(_:)] and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBuffer/addCompletedHandler(_:)].

## Registering state change handlers

- **addScheduledHandler(_:)**: Registers a completion handler the GPU device calls immediately after it schedules the command buffer to run on the GPU.
- **addCompletedHandler(_:)**: Registers a completion handler the GPU device calls immediately after the GPU finishes running the commands in the command buffer.
